name: Inflex Finance
description: INFLEX is a RFI Static reward token unlike any other. We are undoubtably the gold standard of Reflect-style tokens, in terms of safety and economic efficiency. There has been various, well justified, security concerns and inefficiencies with practically every RFI token in existence. INFLEX seeks to set the benchmark with regards to RFI smart contract design, by addressing the identified flaws of our predecessors.
